description: This file defines a Python class 'DuckDuckGoTools' that provides an interface for searching DuckDuckGo and retrieving news using the 'duckduckgo_search' library. It includes methods for performing searches and fetching news, with configurable parameters such as max results, headers, proxies, and timeout.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for performing DuckDuckGo searches and news retrieval, extending the 'Toolkit' base class.

methods.name: duckduckgo_search
methods.description: Performs a DuckDuckGo search with the specified query and maximum results, returning the results as a JSON-formatted string.

methods.name: duckduckgo_news
methods.description: Fetches the latest news from DuckDuckGo for the specified query, returning the news as a JSON-formatted string.
